articles.title: Want to help beyond Giving Tuesday? Here's why cash is king for charities around US
articles.description: Food insecurity rose in 2022 putting pressure on food banks. Here's why food banks say cash donations are the most helpful when feeding the hungry.
articles.content:
The headquarters of the Westside Food Bank in Santa Monica, Calif. hums ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday.

articles.title: Mobility giant Bolt adopts self-driving Starship robots for food delivery
articles.description: Bolt plans to roll out thousands of the robots across multiple countries, starting in its home city of Tallinn later this year.
articles.content: European ride-hailing firm Bolt will start using self-driving robots to deliver customers food as part of a new partnership with fellow Estonian company Starship Technologies, announced yesterday.  … [+2447 chars]
